Text: Been looking for this for a loooong time. Know of anywhere to get it dubbed in english?

megadethmen... 'Nuff said! I've searched for this movie in video stores, eBay, Amazon, and torrent sites and I never find it. I gave up about a year ago and out of a boredom driven hope I searched TPB... THANK YOU! I will be seeding this for a month if everything goes well.

While its still a great movie, this is not the Ultimate Version :(
